description: Crop failed in 1871, yield shown as zero.
Fallow, no crop sown, no fertilizer applied.
N only applied in 1874 at half the usual rate, 48 kgN/ha instead of 96kgN.
Fallow, no crop sown, P, K, Na and Mg fertilizer applied but no N
Very heavy rain during planting in 1886
Tuber dry matter not recorded in 1901, so a mean value of 25.7% used to calculate total tuber dry matter yield in 1901.
